thread.title: A New Business Takes On Fake News

author: L. Gordon Crovitz
title: A New Business Takes On Fake News
text:
The internet broke down barriers by enabling everyone to become a publisher. The unintended consequence was the fake-news epidemic. Teenagers in Macedonia discovered they could make a small fortune from online advertising by concocting outlandish clickbait stories. RT.com, one of the top news sources on YouTube, doesnâ€™t disclose that it is funded by the Russian government, and in 2009 changed its name from Russia Today. 

One cause of the problem is the weakening of news brands, an effect of social media and search engines....
